Title: A Golden Crown
Writer: David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), Jane Espenson (teleplay by), David Benioff (teleplay by), D.B. Weiss (teleplay by), David Benioff (story by), D.B. Weiss (story by)
Actors: Sean Bean, Mark Addy, Michelle Fairley, Lena Headey
Plot: While recovering from his battle with Jaime, Eddard is forced to run the kingdom while Robert goes hunting. Tyrion demands a trial by combat for his freedom. Viserys is losing his patience with Drogo.
